description: Durable, do-it-all hiking shorts that tackle anything from half-day out-and-backs to remote wilderness backpacking adventures, the Basin™ Hike Short features a gusseted construction that offers up serious comfort and range of motion on the move.
name: Mountain Hardwear Basin Trek Shorts, Reg - Mens

specs.value: Nylon Stretch Cotton-touch Plain Weave (94% Nylon, 6% Elastane)
